channel.title: 5.9 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建
channel.description: Recent content in 5.9 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建

item.title: 5.9.9 的 Windows 版本
item.description: 重要 FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED 备注 ODBC and SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage. All Dynamic builds have -plugin-sql-xxx. 备注 All builds have -openssl-linked. It links to an OpenSSL 1.0.2 series which redistributed in the package. Dynamic builds include dynamic OpenSSL while static builds include static OpenSSL. 备注 All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users.

item.title: 5.9.9 的 macOS 版本
item.description: 重要 FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -plugin-sql-sqlite 备注 All builds have -no-openssl -securetransport. It means that we are using Secure Transport library of macOS to provide SSL connections. 备注 All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users.

item.title: 5.9.9 的安卓版本
item.description: 重要 FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -plugin-sql-sqlite 备注 All packages have -openssl-linked, Since BoringSSL, which is used in Android 6.0 or later, is NOT API COMPATIBLE WITH OPENSSL, we link it to a static OpenSSL 1.0.2 series instead of system SSL library. 备注 All builds have -no-icu because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users.
